reviewText:
The main plot in this movie is going round on a new couple incidents to became an "appropriate" family (half necessity, half consumerism). But moreover the plot, there are some great performances (not so usual for mostly TV actors)and you'll find many subtle and smart critics to the way the middle-level workers where forced to addapt to the new "productivity models" at the eighties.
Always enjoyable, this is a must-see mexican comedy.
